TopicTitle: Why does my demo lag out?

Articles.Content:
I'm playing ksp demo an my grandad's PC and It is fine in the VAB but lags out on the launch pad. any help?

windows vista

core 2 duo 2.0ghz

4gb ram.

any1 help?
Is there a forum for the demo?

Is there a forum for the demo?

This one.

More information would help, particularly a log file, more detailed system specs, and a description of "lag out."

That said, I suspect the problem is that your grandfather's PC only just meets the minimum requirements to run KSP. You can try reducing graphics settings and building smaller ships.
